summary: The 'Make Autorail Great Again Act' (H.R. 3660) introduced in the House of Representatives aims to withhold federal funds from the Washington Metropolitan Area Transit Authority (WMATA) until it is renamed the 'Washington Metropolitan Authority for Greater Access' (WMAGA) and Metrorail is renamed to 'Trump Train'. This bill references the Washington Metropolitan Area Transit Regulation Compact to formally mandate the renaming, with no other stated policy changes.
